name: Oasis (itch) (crouton_party)
description:
Oasis is a game about a crab desperately trying to transport a plant across the land after his home dried up. Face the creatures of the desert in an effort to bring the plant to a new home!

This game was made for LowRezJam 2022 by Dustin Garner and Lucas Maciel. We hope you enjoy!
